text: The District of Devoll is one of the thirty-six districts of Albania. It is part of Korçë County. The name is from the Devoll River flowing through the valley. About 33,785 people live in the district. The capital is Bilisht.Albania Gobernment - Flags, Maps, Economy, Geography, Climate... ==References== Category:Districts of Korçë County
title: Devoll District
